text: Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa anata gata to onaji, tada no ningen ni suginai. Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arrā)dearu koto ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Oyoso daredemo,-nushi to no kaiken o koi negau mono wa, tadashī okonai o shi nasai. Kare no omo o Takashiru baai ni nanihitotsu (dōi ni) haichi shite sūhai shite wa naranai
